title: Where Do I Get Music for Videos? (Artlist Demo)
tags: Where Do I Get Music for Videos? (Artlist Demo)
ANSWERED: Where Do I Get Music for Videos? (Artlist Demo)
description: Where do I get music for Computer Clan videos? Today on TidBytes, I reveal all of the secrets. And by "all of the secrets" I mean Artlist. Check out Artlist    Click that link and you'll get 2 free months on us! Plus, you'll be supporting the Computer Clan, and independent artists.  You're not just helping yourself, you're helping other artists. Let's face it, that's pretty cool!  And with Artlist, you can browse and download tons of stock music, and never have to worry about breaking your budget, or your licenses expiring. Having that kind of freedom let's you focus on what's importantyour creative project!   Artlist has helped me a lot, and I know it'll help you, too. Ken  Subscribe for new content!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  More description information can go here.  Contact the CC    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?    In partnership with Artlist Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.
